main.name: Kyu Shim
main.description: I am currently looking for any job relating to Data Engineering, Software Engineering and Development.
main.bio: Graduated from The University of Texas at Dallas, I am someone who brainstorms about projects as well as look at data or numbers. In my spare time, I like to play some of my favorite video games, as well as listen and watch content from some of my favorite content creators and artists.
main.contactmessage: Think I'm a perfect candidate for your job? Want to stay in touch? Send me a message!

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the technologies I have learned about.

education.school: The University of Texas at Dallas
education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Data Science
education.description: While attending, I have learned various technologies and skills pertaining to both Data Science and Computer Science, as well as settling on a career goal of being a Data Engineer.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use git for all projects. I used this during Hackathons, personal projects, and group projects.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: The language I am most familiar with, I use this language primarily for Machine Learning and Scripting.

skills.name: C++
skills.description: My first ever programming language upon entering University. Due to this being my very first official language, it allowed me to familiarize myself with the basics and fundamentals of Computer Science, as well as Object Oriented Programming.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: My second programming language. The language allowed me to familiarize myself with data structure and algorithmic programming more easily.

skills.name: R
skills.description: This language allows me to model and analyze a dataset as well as do some data crunching. Due to the nature of my classes, I have at least 2 years of experience with this language.

skills.name: React JS
skills.description: React JS is used for the front-end of my personal portfolio website development.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: JavaScript is my self-taught language. Although I am not familiar with this language, I primarily use it for website development.

skills.name: SQL
skills.description: SQL is primarily used for schema querying or database analysis.
